backend/main.mo: Actor exposes user profile and resident health record CRUD with admin/user authorization using AccessControl and Map/List storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence linking specific UI changes—logo removal and favicon removal—to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their structure, behavior, and UI roles.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based design tokens and light/dark theme variables plus base background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting the app title and loading the main frontend script without a favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with authentication and React Query providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Gate component that checks Internet Identity state and displays a login card or protected content.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Layout shell providing header, navigation, routed content, and footer with sign-out control.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Simplified navigation bar showing a single Dashboard link with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Dialog form for creating new residents with multi-section data entry and validation handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/a: Dialog for adding an ADL record with form validation and backend submission.
Displays sorted ADL records with delete support and loading/empty states.
Re-exports ADL dialog and history list components.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Modal form for editing resident details with validation, physician list management, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/m: Dialog component for creating a MAR record, handling form input, validation, and submitting records via createMarRecord.
Re-exports MAR-related components for easier imports.
Displays a sortable list of MAR records with delete functionality and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Displays a resident summary card with profile navigation, status toggle, and delete confirmation.
Header for the resident dashboard with title and an add-resident button.
Provides room filter and sorting controls for the resident list.
Renders a grid of ResidentCard components or an empty state when no residents match filters.
Shows KPI cards for total, active, and discharged residents.
Renders tabs for filtering residents by status: All, Active, or Discharged.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Dialog for recording daily vitals, including form handling, unit conversion, validation, and submission to createVitals.
Shows a sortable vitals history list with oxygen status badges and deletion support, plus loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Placeholder component indicating missing reference materials, listing required items and linking to the reference checklist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, logging in, and clearing identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, creating, and deleting vitals, MAR, and ADL records using an actor and authenticated identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, and detailed print styles for reports.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the residents dashboard with filtering, sorting, KPIs, and a dialog for adding residents using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Defines a Medication interface and returns mock medication lists, with a special set for resident ID 3.
Builds mock resident profile details using mockResidents, parsing room info and generating birth dates.
Provides a static list of mock resident records including demographics, room info, and counts for physicians and medications.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Utility functions for filtering, sorting, and extracting KPIs and unique rooms from resident data.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Displays a resident profile with tabs, vitals, MAR, ADL data, editing dialogs, and print/report functionality.
Renders a print‑optimized resident profile report including personal info, insurance, and medication sections.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: React page rendering categorized lists of required reference materials for UI replication tasks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing project version, goals, and existing implemented features with metadata.
